scene.title: Tiger's Roar
scene.text: The night wind blew, and the silver moon hung high.
Illuminated by the moonlight, a single shadow formed. The second layer of shadows was reflected by the dancing candlelight.
The shadow twisted, changing into various shapes. It looked very comical.
Meanwhile, the shadow's masters didn’t budge an inch.

The girl readied herself as if she was holding a sword in her left hand, then clenched it with the right. This was「Crane Moon」—the first stance of the Edge of Taixuan.[\s]And she’d decided that the first attack would be the sixth move of the Li family's 「13 Stances of the Diving Swift」,「Swift Swallow Double Return」.
With her back straightened proudly, the girl enjoyed the first formal competition in her life.

text.p: The dancing candlelight illuminated the young girl in the dark night, making her figure appear much taller.
The man opposite her bowed slightly, bending his spine, legs and arms.[\s]
This stance was 「The Tiger's Roar Shakes The Sky」, a secret technique passed down through the Luo family of Hedong.

scene.text: If someone from the martial arts world were here, they would have wondered why a leader of Golden Sand Society was learning the Luo Family’s Martial Arts.[\s]However, a girl who knew next to nothing about the martial arts world had no way of knowing that

mono.p: The man and the girl stood facing each other, probing at one another without moving an inch.
Moonlit silence enveloped the small courtyard.
Would this kind of silence always befall the East before duels?
They were both looking for an opening in their opponent.
But the third person felt a little impatient.

scene.dialog: 「The thought process of the Shenzhou people...」
scene.text: That person was playing with a small cross in his hand.
scene.dialog: 「It's going to take some time for me to understand.」

cg.img: 氛围_通用_犹大誓约启动

scene.text: He tossed his cross into the air, watching it disappear like mist.
—At the same time, the girl suddenly launched an attack.
After facing it for so long, 「Eagle」 finally showed an opening.
The opening lasted for but a moment. His breathing had become just slightly ragged

text.p: In that moment, the movement of the internal energy stagnated, and the roaring tiger shape immediately disappeared.

scene.text: Li Sushang didn't miss her chance and leaped forward!
—Her fists were like the wind, and her palms struck like lightning!

text.p: The sound of a slap rang out.

motion.img: 老鹰-惊讶-受伤擦血-中景

scene.text: 「Eagle」 staggered and takes a step back, blood flowing from his mouth
He spat several times. The salty, bitter liquid slammed into the stone floor along with his shattered teeth

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰血李普通2

scene.text: The girl smiled as she spoke.
scene.dialog: 「I'll return the second one too, so be careful.」

mono.p: 「Eagle」 couldn't calm his anger.
The girl had slapped him just as he’d made the mistake of moving his mind and lost consciousness for a moment.
Though he hadn’t suffered much damage, this blunder caused him a loss of face.
However, it seemed that Li Sushang has not gone all out yet.
This made him feel more humiliated while having more confidence in the 「Variable」.
He hadn't used 「Tiger Roar Martial Arts」 in a long time, and it was natural for him to be a bit rusty.[\s]
The enemy was not an opponent he could afford to ignore. He would never make the same mistake again

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰血李飞

scene.text: Sushang used 「Swift Swallow Double Return」 again and vanished in the blink of an eye.

text.p: The two of them unleashed three moves while airborne.
Their power was equal, and neither side had the upper hand.

scene.text: The girl landed gracefully, then unleashed 「First Stance-Crane Moon」 again.

mono.p: The roar of the tiger scared the flying swallow.[\s]
The Luo family of Hedong was famous for its fierce roar, which could shake the sky.
The 13 Stances of the Diving Swift was light and varied, each having their own strengths.[\s]
However, the girl who should have been winning in terms of raw power was barely evenly matched against 「Eagle」.
This itself was an unbelievable stump.
「Eagle」 won the bet.
Ever since the battle began, Li Sushang had been unable to use her internal energy.
The reason she continued to take the stance of Edge of Taixuan after her family tradition, 13 Stances of the Diving Swift...
Was to confirm this.
（That medicine shouldn't be working on me...）
In terms of internal energy, 「Edge of Taixuan」 at the Wanderer's gate was probably number one in all Shenzhou.
Each faction in Shenzhou had it's own unique way of thinking. However, even though the formalities had changed, their essence remained unchanged—it all came down to training
If one were to compare internal energy with water, ordinary internal energy would be like practicing a vessel to hold water, constantly increasing its capacity.[\s]
Not to mention the need for repeated hard training, the progress was extremely slow, and there was a risk of exceeding the human body's load.
On the other hand, 「Edge of Taixuan」 was fundamentally different from all others.[\s]
「Blade Mantra」 trained the「Route」, not the 「Vessel」.
It absorbed the true energy from all things in heaven and earth, allowing internal energy to flow freely within one's body like a stream of water.
This new method was created by Phoenix, the founder of the Taixuan school.
It was deep and mysterious, but there were also very large restrictions.

For example, if men were to train in Edge of Taixuan, the majority of them would be slumped midway through their training and wouldn't get any better. It was impossible for anyone other than exceptionally talented young boys to learn such feats
On the other hand, women who practice Taixu sword energy would often get twice the result with half the effort;
Even a person with mediocre talent could become better than the best among men.
Su Shang's master could be said to be the strongest swordswoman in history. In terms of internal energy alone, no one in the world can match her.
The girl she had taught also possessed extraordinary skills.

scene.text: However, at this moment, her internal energy was sealed----

motion.img: 老鹰-惊讶-肉搏百裂拳-中景

scene.text: Heavy fists came at the girl in rapid succession.
Thanks to her extraordinary reflexes and intuition, Li Sushang dodged and blocked each one of 「Eagle」’s attacks.

dialog.p: But even so, I'm the one who wins.）

scene.text: The members of the Golden Sand Society who had fought so far only swung their weapons around with brute force, but 「Eagle」 was different. Not only did he know how to use his fists; he also used his internal energy to strengthen his knuckles—it was obvious that he had extraordinary attainments in internal strength.

text.p: But even if she couldn’t use her internal energy, the girl still had an absolute advantage.
The physical strength of the sword's heart went far beyond that of ordinary people.
After all, the 「Edge of Taixuan」 was the most profound martial art in the world.

scene.text: 「Sword Guard:Weeping Willow」!

text.p: The large man's fists rained down, but Li Sushang was barely able to block it with just a sword guarding stance.

scene.text: Despite this, the tiger's roaring fists continued to attack, like the endless beating of strong winds and huge waves.The girl slowly backed away, using her hand to imitate a sword, and used her gentle strength to dissolve the steel fist into nothingness...
scene.dialog: （Hey... this one called 「Eagle」, does he not know fatigue?）

text.p: The leader of the Golden Sand Bandits didn’t seem tired at all.
Even though the girl stretched out like a willow, blocking all his attacks...
He didn’t let up on her attack for a moment.

scene.text: The shadow of a flood-like fist rushed at Li Sushang.
Now that she had no internal strength to protect her body, taking this heavy blow would easily break her like a dead branch.
scene.dialog: （No, there are no loopholes in guarding the sword form.）
scene.text: Such thoughts grazed Li Sushang’s head, but they didn't make a ripple and were quickly erased.

dialog.p: （I've seen through most of his punches. The Six sword stance can handle them well enough...
...On the other hand, if this person continues to waste his energy in vain, he will inevitably exhaust himself and decline.）

text.p: There was no way 「Eagle」 wouldn’t understand such simple logic.[\s]
But why would he continue his onslaught as usual?

scene.text: Under the restriction of losing her internal energy, Li Sushang was unwilling to take action rashly.
As she waited for her chance,[\s]waiting for a flaw.
